articles.author: The Associated Press, Astha Rajvanshi
articles.title: Healthy babies born from DNA of three people to prevent inherited diseases - NBC News
articles.description: Eight healthy babies were born in Britain with the help of an experimental technique that uses DNA from three people
articles.content: LONDON -- Eight healthy babies were born in Britain with the help of an experimental technique that uses DNA from three people to help mothers avoid passing devastating rare diseases to their childre… [+5561 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Apple News+ adds a new game that uses emoji and Genmoji to solve puzzles - TechCrunch
articles.description: Released to coincide with World Emoji Day, the new Emoji Game is part logic, part word game that's inspired by how we use emojis to communicate.
articles.content: Apple is introducing a new reason to upgrade to its subscription news offering, Apple News+: more games. On Thursday, the company announced the addition of the Emoji Game, an original title that will… [+2697 chars]
